targets.expr: ((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)) / (((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)) + ((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_penalty{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)) + (sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_missed_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)) * 100

(sum_over_time((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) / ((sum_over_time((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) + (sum_over_time((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_penalty{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) + sum_over_time((sum by () (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_missed_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) * 100

(sum_over_time((sum by (nos_name) (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:]) / 10^9) - (sum_over_time((sum by (nos_name) (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_penalty{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:]) / 10^9)

(sum_over_time((sum by (nos_name) (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) / ((sum_over_time((sum by (nos_name) (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) + (sum_over_time((sum by (nos_name) (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_penalty{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) + sum_over_time((sum by (nos_name) (ethereum_validators_monitoring_operator_missed_reward{nos_name=~'${nos_name_array_var}'}) AND ON() changes(ethereum_validators_monitoring_epoch_number[30s]) > 0)[$__range:])) * 100
